title: [Samyrle's Salon, Women's Wear]
description: Dominating this side of the room is a large glaes bay window hung with sheer gold-threaded ivory voile curtains, pulled back to the wall with a black silk tassel.  A window seat with a tufted cushion awaits weary shoppers, affording them a prime view of the busy street.

Dominating this side of the room is a large glaes bay window hung with sheer gold-threaded ivory voile curtains, pulled back to the wall with a black silk tassel.  A window seat with a tufted cushion awaits weary shoppers, affording them a prime view of the street, quiet at this hour.
